problem_text_cn: 如图,数学兴趣小组的小颖想测量教学楼前的一棵树的树高,下午课外活动时她测得一根长为1m的竹竿的影长是0.8m,但当她马上测量树高时,发现树的影子不全落在地面上,有一部分影子落在教学楼的墙壁上(如图),他先测得留在墙壁上的影高为1.2m,又测得地面的影长为2.6m,请你帮她算一下,树高是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the picture, Xiaoying of the mathematics interest group wants to measure the height of a tree in front of the teaching building. During the extracurricular activities in the afternoon, she measured the shadow length of a bamboo pole with a length of N_0 as N_1, but when she immediately measured the height of the tree , Found that not all the shadows of the trees fell on the ground, and some of the shadows fell on the walls of the teaching building (as shown in the picture). He first measured the height of the shadow left on the wall as N_2, and then measured the shadow length on the ground as N_3. Please help her calculate, the height of the tree is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,设BD是BC在地面的影子,树高为x,根据竹竿的高与其影子的比值和树高与其影子的比值相同得\frac{CB}{BD}=\frac{1}{0.8}而CB=1.2,∴BD=0.96,∴树在地面的实际影子长是0.96+2.6=3.56,再竹竿的高与其影子的比值和树高与其影子的比值相同得\frac{x}{3.56}=\frac{1}{0.8},∴x=4.45,∴树高是4.45m．故选:C．
